name: @linkedmink/multilevel-aging-cache
description: Package provides an interface to cache and persist data to Redis, MongoDB, memory

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:ioredis && npm run build:mongodb && npm run build:mongoose
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:ioredis && npm run test:mongodb && npm run test:mongoose
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run lint:ioredis && npm run lint:mongodb && npm run lint:mongoose
scripts.format:all: npm run format && npm run format:ioredis && npm run format:mongodb && npm run format:mongoose
scripts.link: npm run build && npm link && npm link @linkedmink/multilevel-aging-cache
scripts.link:ioredis: cd plugins/ioredis && npm run link && cd ../../ && npm link @linkedmink/multilevel-aging-cache-ioredis
scripts.link:mongodb: cd plugins/mongodb && npm run link && cd ../../ && npm link @linkedmink/multilevel-aging-cache-mongodb
scripts.link:mongoose: cd plugins/mongoose && npm run link && cd ../../ && npm link @linkedmink/multilevel-aging-cache-mongoose
scripts.postpublish: npm run publish:ioredis && npm run publish:mongodb && npm run publish:mongoose
scripts.doc:all: npm run doc && npm run doc:ioredis && npm run doc:mongodb && npm run doc:mongoose
